Title: Girls wristwatch with a pink, lilac and turquoise floral strap, casual wear
Description: Girls wristwatch with a pink, lilac and turquoise floral strap, in full working order. I would say it is best suited as casual wear.The watch features:-· A round watch face · 12 hour dial with a second counter on the outside· quartz battery · analogue display· pastel yellow face · pink hour hand with the word ‘hour’ on it, black minute hand with the word ‘minute’ on it and a black second hand· 19mm width of face· 19mm length of face· 20cm watch strap (excluding metal end) Watch has a mark on the strap which may wipe off – overall the watch is in very good condition.
